events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision on April 30th involving their sedan with another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial incident descriptions and keywords.
An experienced claims agent specialized in auto accidents has been assigned to assist the customer promptly.
Acknowledgement of the accident claim sent to the customer expressing commitment to timely handling.
Customer requested to submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and insurance policy documents.
Received all necessary documents including police report and photos showing the collision damage clearly.
Initiated investigation to verify facts around the vehicle collision and assess extent of damages.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and damage severity consistent with customer's submitted evidence.
Proposed settlement amount covering repair costs and rental car expenses sent to the customer for review.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement offer and appreciated the thorough investigation.
Approval granted to proceed with payment based on agreed terms and documented claim assessment.
Settlement amount was paid out to the customerâ€™s bank account, completing financial obligations.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after successful payment and confirmation of customer agreement.
All claim documents and correspondence archived securely for future reference and regulatory compliance.
